prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with vibrant green leaves and playful demeanor.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a dinosaur with leafy features and a sunny disposition.
Generate a creature that embodies nature, featuring bright yellow colors and a friendly smile.
Make a bipedal Pokemon with a long neck and a leafy tail, full of energy.
Imagine a cheerful yellow Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, surrounded by greenery.
Design a Pokemon that has a combination of green and yellow with a focus on plant traits.
Give me a nature-loving Pokemon that looks like it could dance among the trees.
